text: Saginafusus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Saginafusus include: * Saginafusus pricei (E.A. Smith, 1887) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Saginafusus
